summary: Xiaomi, founded in 2010, focuses on creating affordable, innovative consumer electronics globally. With a mission to deliver heartfelt, cost-effective products, Xiaomi's revenue surpassed billions within 7 years. The company emphasizes technology, value, and cool products as core principles. Future strategies include re-entrepreneurship, Internet+manufacturing, and steady progress. Xiaomi aims to inspire innovation, lead smart living trends, and contribute to China's manufacturing advancements in the next decade. Xiaomi envisions a future where technology enhances lives worldwide, reflecting engineers' aspirations and shaping global lifestyles.
